website_summaries.verdict: An affordable lint roller with extra sheets that work well for pet hair and last a long time.
pros: Includes 1 lint roller and 3 refills for a total of 240 sheets
Features a flexible handle to make it easier to maneuver over all surfaces
Refills are easy to install and the sheets are very sticky
cons: Since the sheets are so sticky, they can be a little difficult to remove

customer_reviews.title: which is great in case the dogs get a hold of it
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for an affordable pet hair roller for some time, and this set is blowing me away. To get 4 total rolls (3 refill's and one in the actual roller) makes this set more of a value. The roller itself is made of high quality plastic and seems indestructible, which is great in case the dogs get a hold of it. I find that we are using this just as much for regular lint as we are for pet hair. It works great for both applications.
customer_reviews.author: Asquared

customer_reviews.title: the sticky roll doesn't fly off the handle every 4 seconds like other lint rollers do
customer_reviews.text: Because the roller is perpendicular to the handle, the sticky roll doesn't fly off the handle every 4 seconds like other lint rollers do. This makes it a pleasure to use. With two cats and a dog that you'd think is allergic to her own fur given the volume of hair she sheds (anyone planning on making some cushions? I have plenty of filler available) this gets used all the time. Why is it that the cat that hardly sheds is always asleep under someone's bed but the one that sheds like crazy always wants to sit in my chair? Only small complaint is that the sticky part could be a bit stickier. Still gets 5 stars from me, though.
customer_reviews.author: Alasdair Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, convenient and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This product was so amazing! It was really cheap and you get 4 rolls for that cost. Not to mention, it was so effective in getting rid of hair on the sofa, lint from the clothes etc. I have such a hard time cleaning up the clothes of threads, lint and small particulate dust - but this product worked pretty smoothly, especially for what it's costing! It works pretty quick too - no need to do multiple rolls over the same area. Recommend buying it if you want to make your life easier :)
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Only by this if you have a tremendous amount of patience
customer_reviews.text: At first it took me some time to find the edge. I could not tell the sheets were cut on an angle. They are very thin and hard to grab if you have a hint of arthritis or joint issues. The sheets are hard to see with out glasses. It takes a copious amount of picking so I recorded it as an example and luckily that time it came off in one piece because usually it is multiple pieces and I end up throwing it across the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonjunkie

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected, but works.
customer_reviews.text: The closing lid is more of a negative than a positive. I get the approach, but the execution is poor. The way it's engineered, when you roll it, the lid sometimes catches and closes... Which can be a little bit of a hassle. The sheets are hard to remove. And seem to reverse every 2-5th sheet. I don't understand this and it's very tedious. Does remove lint well and the sheets are pretty sticky. In the future, I will probably go with a different lint roller. 6/10. Probably would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY-NO REALLY!!
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing in the description that said you needed an engineering degree to figure it out! Total waste of money and time. Just trying to get the lid off of it, following instructions, was near to impossible and broke 3 nails doing so. I just wanna pick up the roller, role the hair and be done with it. Impossible with this thing. Will have to schedule in my planner time to assemble and deassemble the thing to replace the tape. I gave it one star because the lid is an excellent idea. There's enough stress in my life without having to stress over a cat hair roller! Don't even know if it can be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jellicledoc

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend for daily use
customer_reviews.text: No.. this roller has cover which may look good and may protect the sticky part when you are not using them. However due to that cover, it is very difficult to use them. This is a roller so you should roll them to use it and whenever I roll them 8 out of 10 times it roll and close the cap (or the cover) If you realize the cover is closed then you can simply just open them up and try to roll it again but if you did not realize it was closed and you roll them all over the cloths and find out after 2 minutes, you will see your other-side of you.. like I did. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TryAnything

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought 3 more sets of these rollers so I must be satisfied with them. The individual wraps are a bit difficult to remove. The problem is finding the end of each one. A good finger nail helps and I scrap up the end of a wrap before I use it. Just lift up maybe a quarter inch. After using the roller the sheet end is harder to find. The next sheet end will be on the opposite side. Edward, the cat, seems to enjoy being rolled. Rollers work. Takes about 3 sheets to properly roll the cat. Also great on furniture, my clothes, and even my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Karl59062

customer_reviews.title: Best lint rollers I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: I've used a bunch of different lint rollers to pick up my cats hair, and this one works the best by far. I usually just get whatever the local pharmacy or supermarket has, but no more. These work WAY better than any of the store bought ones I've tried. And the fact you get 4 rolls total with this is just icing on the cake. Try them out- you'll be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: Lee R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great case but don’t like actual roller!  See neg reviews before buying
customer_reviews.text: I love that the case keeps it from sticking to everything and makes it look nice. That being said (and that is the only thing deserving of a star!), the actually roller needs improvement ASAP! Once you roll up the dog hair there is no way to find the edge to tear off the strip! I am nearly destroying this thing trying to find the edge. Because it’s on a slant instead of straight across, you don’t see that defining edge and it’s so frustrating. Going back to original roller that has no case but has a defined strip and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Rolls up lint well, housing is cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 12/18/18 Seller sent me a replacement unit free of charge. Thank you very much! This thing does its job properly, and I mean very well!! The housing and roller itself though are subpar. The closing door will no longer stay open and gets caught while I'm using it ALL the time now! The little notches that hold it are worn down and will not keep the door from sliding down. Might just have to buy another because it's the best lint roller I've found and used, by far!
customer_reviews.author: LarryFisherman

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: 2 things make this difficult to use. The portion of the roller that opens and closes, closes very easily when in use. I have to stop, open it and keep going till it closes again. The other issue is when a sheet is used up, one has to find where it starts and peel it off. The trick is getting it started. I get so frustrated trying to find it with my nail, I have to get scissors or a knife. I would never buy this again. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria B.

customer_reviews.title: I love the extra sticky sheets
customer_reviews.text: This product actually does what it states it will do. The roller picks up hairs on my clothing I have previously had to pick off by hand. I love the extra sticky sheets. I also like the case the product is in. I will definitely throw out all the other lint rollers I have on hand (that never worked as advertised) and stick with this brand. People with furry friends won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Big  mama

customer_reviews.title: small roller, hard to peel, doesnt pick up much
customer_reviews.text: one roll across fabric and you have to remove the sheet because that is all its worth. Good luck getting to the next sticky layer though. Next to impossible to find an edge. that is how thin these tapes are. worse still, when you find an edge it doesnt peel off easily. it tears into little scraps. I want to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Zarate

customer_reviews.title: Not very sticky
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed in the stickiness of the tape. They don't pick up larger pieces of lint, but for cat hair, they work alright. The layers are easy enough to change, they peel off cleanly. I bought this for my work trousers, they're dark blue, and even if I wash them alone, nothing else in the washer or dryer, they still come out covered in lint. I may try a lint brush once I use these up.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

customer_reviews.title: a bit tricky
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, I'll give it that! But they do not make it easy to know where to peel from. I find my self searching for 5 minutes every time I need to get a new sheet. It doesn't peel from the same place each time, so it can be a bit frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Nebula

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing, overpriced and potentially damaging to furniture
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing - I was hopeful these would work at least as well if not better than a standard 'lint roller', I was shocked when the rollers not only picked up less, but also due to the design of the roller left 'tracks' on the furniture and fabrics the roller was used on. Purchase with caution as the cost per sheet and potential risk to whatever this product is used on may not be worth it. I cannot recommend and will be requesting a return/refund.
customer_reviews.author: MJLSr

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not a magic solution to dog hair
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would truly be EXTRA sticky and pick up more than my Scotch rollers. Not so much. Biggest advantage is cover that rolls over the sticky stuff which is easier to deal with than replacing the paper cover each time. It works but not any better than less expensive rollers. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you like frustration.
customer_reviews.text: The roller has refills but it doesn't pick up dog hair any better than 3m. Pulling off the used paper is a particularly frustrating process. I had to use a tweezer to find the beginning of the roller since it tears on the diagonal. Most of the time it doesn't tear cleanly and it takes more time than it should. I really dislike this roller.
customer_reviews.author: Gramm E

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: This product is weird. Although it does pick up dirt well, the plastic housing is cheap and the rolls get dislodged while rolling and you have to put them back in place. Second, the lid closes sometimes, interrupting your rolling. Lastly, the sheets are extremely hard to rip off. I just have to guess and hope I picked the right corner to peel. Overall, not worth the trouble - just buy a normal lint roller. Will not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Removes hair pretty well
customer_reviews.text: It removes pet hair pretty well. My only complaint is the cover. I have to roll it up only because if I go down the lid catches and it’s a bit annoying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value sturdy roller
customer_reviews.text: Good value! Much more sturdy than the ones with vertical handles. Seems like it will hold up well and the ability to close it is nice though I’m not certain the “lid” will operate in the open position for a long period .It seems like the “lid” may loosen over time and close when you are using the roller. But even so, still worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nyHartley

customer_reviews.title: like the cheaper masking tape ones better
customer_reviews.text: like the cheaper masking tape ones better. This one isn't as good at getting cat hair off of things as I thought that it would be Edited to add that the seller is very responsive and helpful. Although I wouldn't buy this exact item again, I would definately buy from this seller again. They go above and beyone to make things right
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to replace refills
customer_reviews.text: Poor design. Basically have to take it apart to replace the tape inside. (WHich isn't very sticky). Chinese junk like most of the stuff on Amazon these days.
customer_reviews.author: JG8088

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but hard to peel tape
customer_reviews.text: I like the tape roll holder and how it has a cover that flips over the tape, because I'm always losing that outside wrap that comes with most tape rollers. My only complaints are that it's hard to start a piece of tape to peel off and I rarely end up peeling off just one layer of tape. I prefer the straight line peel that most tape rolls have.
customer_reviews.author: SHowl

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that thos has a closeable cover. It is quite good at picking up dog hair. I have one in the drawer in my guest room and the closeable cover keeps it from getting a sticky mess on the wood of the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Riley's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best roller ever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this to get all the dog hair out of his truck after a long trip and he said it was the easiest thing ever. He wants me to buy more, and can't say enough good things about them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim O.

customer_reviews.title: Very sticky
customer_reviews.text: These are very sticky but they are hard to remove the strips. It has a pattern on that is supposed to make it easy to remove the sheet. It isnt very easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: mary catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great item but tricky at ending of sheets.
customer_reviews.text: Great item and perfect shape too. The only negative thing about this lint roller is when you get almost to the last 15 sheets it is hard to remove and use on flat hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pet hair roller I have ever used. 1 sheet did the trick removing pet hair from my pants. I used to use several sheets before. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Joni28

customer_reviews.title: Lint roller is a bummer 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: Unable to tear off used sheet. The first sheet worked great. It is not practical for every day use.Bunner
customer_reviews.author: Jean E. Gerst

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Roller
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s very easy easy to use and picks up all the pet fur off my couch. I highly recommend this roller
customer_reviews.author: christine nassikas

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I like nothing about it, it isn't even kinda sticky and peeling off the used strip is nearly impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Buck Burton

customer_reviews.title: Helpful handle position
customer_reviews.text: Really not much different than a lint roller you’d buy anywhere. One saving grace for this produce is the way the handle is positioned, it makes lint rolling furniture much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Christina K

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: The tape is very sticky and works better than most rollers. The only thing that would improve it is if the cover clicked shut. As it is it slides open way too easily so you may as well not have the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works for what I got it for which is to remove hair from pillows and couches in the house. I wish it were larger but overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: I love these rollers....very sticky and I love the cover part of them as well. Don't have to keep putting a paper one over it and keep trying to get it straight. I just simply LOVE THESE....
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lee Proctor

customer_reviews.title: a most have for my job
customer_reviews.text: use this at my job to clean dust and lint off of conveyor belts. Really does a good job and picks up tons of other dirt too with out leaving residue.
customer_reviews.author: Pizza pizza

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: this is the biggest waste of money i ever saw. the tape won't cut off the way it should. it cut for a few rolls and i ended up throwing out the first roll and now the second is acting up. i would NEVER EVER buy this again, and this is the FIRST bad review i've ever sent in. very poor product. after complaining, the company contacted me and is sending a second shipment free of charge. i'm certainly willing to give this another go.
customer_reviews.author: A. I. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: Not many strips on roll. Very difficult to peel off used strip. Very difficult to change rolls. Strips were not powerful as discription states. All in all, very poor value and difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Eliz Shay

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the case
customer_reviews.text: Works well, for the most part, the only complaint is the case. Might be a user error but I find it sticking to the case a lot, my husband says it is because I push too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Marinda

customer_reviews.title: Really bad
customer_reviews.text: The case works well but the lint roller itself is really, really bad. It's really hard to pull the sheets off, they're not very sticky at all, and it takes two sheets just to do one pair of pants
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Super hard to get sheets "unstuck'
customer_reviews.text: Took me half an hour and a broken nail. Now I need to do a second sheet somehow. Not good for me
customer_reviews.author: IM

customer_reviews.title: Roller doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, keeps falling apart when you try to use it. I don't recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this product--It picks up quite a bit--nice handle ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this product--It picks up quite a bit--nice handle and once I figured it out easy to pull off old sheet!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Strange
customer_reviews.text: This lint roller closes but I can't seem how to use it without the cover shutting on me. I'm not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wright

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Best hair roller set ever! Works, wast removal with dispenser. Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: great lint roller
customer_reviews.text: Very effective lint roller, works great on pet hair. Plenty of refills. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to peel! But it does the job. I just dont prefer the angle peel! It took more time to peel than anything!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not that sticky.
customer_reviews.text: These rollers are not very sticky. I have a long haired toy dog, I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good just a pain in the butt to remove the sticky paper
customer_reviews.author: React3

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Tape won't roll. It gets caught on the plastic part of the roller. Clips that hold the sides in aren't strong and pull out at the slightest resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lint rollers for all my animal hair
customer_reviews.text: Great lint rollers for all my animal hair. Also love that I can close the lid on the roller so that it doesnt stick to everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Sheets are thin and often rip when pulling the used sheets off. The holder is nice but I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Falcon Lirica

customer_reviews.title: Only buy this if you don't cut your nails. ...
customer_reviews.text: Only buy this if you don't cut your nails. So impossible to get the tape off to the next spot. I want to throw the damn thing out of the window. Thanks editors choice! Now I know not to pay attention to that.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well on pet hair
customer_reviews.text: We have lots of dogs. This roller isn't very sticky. Barely picks up the hair. The new sheets are a really big pain to pull off. Won't buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon Estes

customer_reviews.title: It’s not super sticky
customer_reviews.text: I really Like the design of the whole thing, however the whole super sticky part is a LIE¡ Blaten lie I need something that actually works This is my 3rd atempt at a pet hair roller, all 3 are different and all don’t do the job
customer_reviews.author: Football Mom #55

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great lint roller for a great price. I love that it has a cover and it’s easy to peel off the next strip
customer_reviews.author: Perkykeri

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s really hard to get the sheets off compared to Other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M Brown

customer_reviews.title: I don't find it to be any stickier than any other
customer_reviews.text: I also wish they'd put more on the rolls. Not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Carla J.

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: This really works and the cover keeps it from getting stuck to everything
customer_reviews.author: Georgia O'Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Not very sticky
customer_reviews.text: I would not describe these as extra sticky . One swipe across fabric and not sticky anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Riverland

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME FOR PET HAIR
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality and a great price for 4 rollers. Better than scotch in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: J.R.H

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to try because our dog sheds like crazy. Works just like a regular lint roller so it works but nothing special
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst lint roller I’ve ever bought! Do not waste your money! Extremely cheap and poorly made product. Go to target or Walmart and get a lint roller that actually works and you can peal the paper back. I would give zero starts if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Rindy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The dog will occasionally jump on the bed and I have been using the roller to remove the excess dog hair. Comforter is thick so it grabs the roller well and the roller removes most of the hair. Usually takes 3 pieces but removal for new pad is simple and easy. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great roller and the rolls are super sticky
customer_reviews.text: Great roller and the rolls are super sticky, picking up a lot of pet hair! The roll paper is easy to remove to get a new sheet.
customer_reviews.author: tracy ferretti

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and therapeutic lint removal
customer_reviews.text: So sturdy and easy to peel. I have one on each floor.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Mandel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Terribly hard to get it to work and only good for one use not worth it
customer_reviews.author: kitsune

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I threw it out. I spent 20 minutes trying to get it to work....not good. Should not be that complicated
customer_reviews.author: R. Mccloud

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love these for getting dog hair off my couch!
customer_reviews.author: Pink_smoke25

customer_reviews.title: Super sticky
customer_reviews.text: Super sticky and very thin sheets, which feels like less waste. Perfect for cat hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: With two long-haired cats, I needed a sticky, sticky roller to pick up the fuzz from upholstered furniture. The roller does an excellent job.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works better than any other lint roller I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan A.

customer_reviews.title: works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Do wish it had a visible start tab.
customer_reviews.author: Arlie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy this lint roller!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it! Roller doesn’t work. The roller falls apart every time I try to use it. The tape picks up dog fur alright but I have to dab it on object that needs dog hair removal.
customer_reviews.author: K. Spooner

customer_reviews.title: for the price and the way it secures perfect so that it doesn't close as you're cleaning is ...
customer_reviews.text: for the price and the way it secures perfect so that it doesn't close as you're cleaning is the best! doesn't feel like its gonna break anytime soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the best picker, it works fine but not too sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Safi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These do not work, it took 20 sheets just to clean a 2 foot square of my bed and there is still hair, holder broke on 2nd use, total waste of money, I should of bought the Scott ones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great to clean up pet hair and I like that I have several refills
customer_reviews.author: Shannonroz

customer_reviews.title: Better than store bought
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Wife h as s 1 in car and 1 in house
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is easy to assembly and Very practical. really good item
customer_reviews.author: Pei Liu

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money! The roll doesn’t stay in the holder, it will only roll one way, due to the cover closing. The paper does not remove easily, it tears and rips in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk  Hunter

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have had many pet hair removers but I like this one best. It's very easy to roll in short strokes and long strokes because of the roller design and it definitely picks up my white cat's hair.
customer_reviews.author: cagoils

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Meets description and was pleased with the productivity. Works well on dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: dupesauce

customer_reviews.title: So easy to peel off!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does the cover on these rollers keep them clean. The old sheet is pulled off from the same spot every time, so you don't have to keep rolling it around to find the seem to expose the new sheet.
customer_reviews.author: James Moore

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a few days
customer_reviews.text: I liked this a lot until the wheel broke after only a few days usage and not even one roll of sticky papers.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Bohnert

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lint roller. I love the cover feature.
customer_reviews.author: Katie W

customer_reviews.title: Crx
customer_reviews.text: Worst piece of crap u ever bought. Roller will not stay in holder..will not roll without falling off.
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and Design
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Finding the starting point for the next section is virtually impossible. Small sections that pick up very little pet hair. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Small roll for what I needed It for but still does the job!
customer_reviews.author: karnakk

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Almost impossible to tear the dirty sheet off. Very frustrating. Sorry i bought a 3 pack.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Closing Lid closes shut when trying to use it. Very cheaply made. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can not pull off tape
customer_reviews.text: I was given this as a gift. You can not peel the tape off to get to a clean piece. Very aggravating. Even had my husband try. It states money back guarantee. The company stood by their product and gave me a full refund. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sheilah

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to use compared to the standard roller.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L Dement

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the roller closes to maintain stickiness!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: The literal worst
customer_reviews.text: The refills don't fit the roller, by like half an inch. Also very hard to peel layers off.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer12345

customer_reviews.title: Roller stucked
customer_reviews.text: The inner roll keep falling down and when I use it, it doesn’t goes smoothly.

customer_reviews.title: Very good

product_meta.title: Lint Roller - Pet Hair Remover Rollers - Extra Sticky Lint Remover Brush with 3 Refills, 240 Sheets Total - Best for Dog & Cat Fur Removal (1 Lint Roller + 3 Refills)
product_meta.description:
Delomo pet hair lint roller picks up lint, fur, hair, fuzz, and debris to make your home always look clean, fresh and spotless  
Concerned about your furniture, bedding, couch and clothing covered with hair & fur? 
Tired of the lint rollers that spoil or damage the furniture? 
Frustrated with the messy and hard-to-tear lint roller sheets? 
Annoyed with lint roller handles that break easily? 

 

At Last, a highly improved Lint Roller & Pet Hair Remover that will keep the house and car tidy and clean! No more furniture damage. No more difficulty with stubborn sheets that refuse to tear off. Useful, durable and convenient, because you deserve it!!

Perfect for:  
Removing pet hair & lint from clothing. 
Getting rid of food crumbs and paper scraps. 
Cleaning the furniture & car: quickly collects all hair, dust and pet dandruff 
Floor and carpet cleaning: Scroll your roller to collect dirt and debris. 

 

Product Details:  
· 60 sheets per refill, a total of 240 sheets 
· Ergonomic handle, durable and difficult to break 
· Practical high-quality dust cover protects the paper core 
· Useful, Durable, Convenient & Replaceable 
· Updated Diagonally Cut Design, easy to tear off and avoid waste. 

 

Note: This product is mainly designed to efficiently collect dust or hair. It is not suitable for shaving lint balls, which often collect on sweaters.  

100% satisfaction guarantee: 
Delomo is a small but innovative business, so we focus much attention to the quality of our products and pride ourselves on customer satisfaction. Thus, purchasing from DelomoDirect, provides you with a 100% satisfaction guarantee.
feature_bullets: Perfect for Pet Hair Removal: Are you concerned about pet hair? Embarrassed by the fur covered furniture? It’s not a problem! Our pet hair & lint roller quickly snatches up cat and dog hair, dust, dirt, and lint from almost all surfaces. Effectively removes pet hair and dust without fussing with a vacuum. Keep your home sleek, clean and beautiful

Flexible & Innovative Handle Design: Our handle's design is more flexible, it can be rolled all directions. Exceptionally durable and strong, our ergonomic handle ensures a light, comfortable control and effectively captures all unsightly hair, fur and dust
Avoid Damage to Your Furniture and Clothing: Why us? The smooth tear design reduces unnecessary waste. Balanced for effective pet hair removal without risk of damaging furniture and clothes surfaces

1 Lint Roller + 3 Refills: Each extra sticky refill consists of 60 sheets, a total of 240 sheets. Affordable pricing and convenient replaceable packaging. Comes equipped with a convenient cover to protect the roller core from dust, fur and hair when not in use

Customer Satisfaction Guaranteed: Buy from DelomoDirect, get 100% satisfaction guaranteed. Our store offers superior quality products, if the handle of the roller is damaged during normal use, we promise a 100% refund
